document_data.name: ''Robe of Light''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Robes of light''''' were [[enchanted]] [[robe]]s that protected its wearers from darkness.
document_data.Description: These soft yellow robes were weaved out of the finest [[silk]].
document_data.Powers: These aptly named magic pieces of clothing were imbued with a permitting aura of light that illuminated the area of {{SI|15'|'"|long=yes}} around them.
document_data.History: ''Robes of light'' gained popularity on the [[Sword Coast]], in the cities like [[Neverwinter]] and [[Daggerford]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. One of these robes was sold by [[Boonmoppet]] the [[imp]] from the [[Western Farmlands]].
